<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Strip.first != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The vunpackus only handle byte and half-word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Strip.second != 1 &amp;&amp; Strip.second != 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = VecLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> = Strip.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, check the non-ignored strips.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 2&#42;L; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> += 2&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = <a href="#a31baf44c8a987440fb895c5ad7020d4c">findStrip</a>(SM.Mask.drop&#95;front(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S.second != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (2&#42;S.first != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the -1s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = L; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> += 2&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = <a href="#a31baf44c8a987440fb895c5ad7020d4c">findStrip</a>(SM.Mask.drop&#95;front(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S.first != -1 || S.second != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = Strip.second == 1 ? Hexagon::V6&#95;vunpackub</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   : Hexagon::V6&#95;vunpackuh;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.push(Opc, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#af86fa2fc7e44e59bc63d72181ffa77b7">getPairVT</a>(MVT::i8), &#123;Va&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a8ababd0d43313d3b6a1efb76cb0b74fd">OpRef::res</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.top());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><span class="doxyHighlight">OpRef HvxSelector::perfect(ShuffleMask SM, OpRef Va, ResultStack &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a3fcdc9f30e5e8b9ea4da99868a8ae4a9">DEBUG&#95;WITH&#95;TYPE</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;isel&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V6&#95;vdeal&#123;b,h&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V6&#95;vshuff&#123;b,h&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V6&#95;vshufoe&#123;b,h&#125;  those are quivalent to vshuffvdd(..,&#123;1,2&#125;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V6&#95;vshuffvdd (V6&#95;vshuff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V6&#95;dealvdd (V6&#95;vdeal)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecLen = SM.Mask.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(VecLen) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(VecLen) &lt;= 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LogLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(VecLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HwLog = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a7a05c55eb721c0bd568d4b7b1c2c7baf">HwLen</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The result length must be the same as the length of a single vector,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or a vector pair.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LogLen == HwLog || LogLen == HwLog + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HavePairs = LogLen == HwLog + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 8&gt; Perm(LogLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this could be a perfect shuffle, or a combination of perfect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shuffles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider this permutation (using hex digits to make the ASCII diagrams</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// easier to read):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#123; 0, 8, 1, 9, 2, A, 3, B, 4, C, 5, D, 6, E, 7, F &#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a &quot;deal&quot; operation: divide the input into two halves, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create the output by picking elements by alternating between these two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// halves:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7    --&gt;    0 8 1 9 2 A 3 B 4 C 5 D 6 E 7 F  &#91;&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   8 9 A B C D E F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Aside from a few special explicit cases (V6&#95;vdealb, etc.), HVX provides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a somwehat different mechanism that could be used to perform shuffle/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deal operations: a 2x2 transpose.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider the halves of inputs again, they can be interpreted as a 2x8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// matrix. A 2x8 matrix can be looked at four 2x2 matrices concatenated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// together. Now, when considering 2 elements at a time, it will be a 2x4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// matrix (with elements 01, 23, 45, etc.), or two 2x2 matrices:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 23  45 67</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   89 AB  CD EF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With groups of 4, this will become a single 2x2 matrix, and so on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 2x2 transpose instruction works by transposing each of the 2x2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// matrices (or &quot;sub-matrices&quot;), given a specific group size. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the group size is 1 (i.e. each element is its own group), there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be four transposes of the four 2x2 matrices that form the 2x8.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, with the inputs as above, the result will be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   0 8  2 A  4 C  6 E</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 9  3 B  5 D  7 F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, this result can be tranposed again, but with the group size of 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   8 19  4C 5D</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2A 3B  6E 7F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we then transpose that result, but with the group size of 4, we get:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   819 2A3B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   4C5D 6E7F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we concatenate these two rows, it will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   0 8 1 9 2 A 3 B 4 C 5 D 6 E 7 F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is the same as the &quot;deal&quot; &#91;&#42;&#93; above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In general, a &quot;deal&quot; of individual elements is a series of 2x2 transposes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with changing group size. HVX has two instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Vdd = V6&#95;vdealvdd Vu, Vv, Rt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Vdd = V6&#95;shufvdd  Vu, Vv, Rt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that perform exactly that. The register Rt controls which transposes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// going to happen: a bit at position n (counting from 0) indicates that a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transpose with a group size of 2^n will take place. If multiple bits are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set, multiple transposes will happen: vdealvdd will perform them starting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the largest group size, vshuffvdd will do them in the reverse order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The main observation is that each 2x2 transpose corresponds to swapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// columns of bits in the binary representation of the values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The numbers &#123;3,2,1,0&#125; and the log2 of the number of contiguous 1 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a given column. The &#42; denote the columns that will be swapped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transpose with the group size 2^n corresponds to swapping columns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 (the highest log) and log2(n):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     3 2 1 0         0 2 1 3         0 2 3 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#42;     &#42;             &#42; &#42;           &#42; &#42;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1  0 0 0 1      8  1 0 0 0      8  1 0 0 0      8  1 0 0 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  7  0 1 1 1      E  1 1 1 0      D  1 1 0 1      B  1 0 1 1</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A  1 0 1 0      3  0 0 1 1      3  0 0 1 1      5  0 1 0 1</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  F  1 1 1 1      F  1 1 1 1      F  1 1 1 1      F  1 1 1 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is one special case that is not a perfect shuffle, but can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turned into one easily: when the shuffle operates on a vector pair,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but the two vectors in the pair are swapped. The code that identifies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// perfect shuffles will reject it, unless the order is reversed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/shuffles/#acb41012abd66d47c0b3fecdab9e25626">shuffles::MaskT</a> MaskStorage(SM.Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InvertedPair = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HavePairs &amp;&amp; SM.Mask&#91;0&#93; &gt;= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a7a05c55eb721c0bd568d4b7b1c2c7baf">HwLen</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = SM.Mask.size(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = SM.Mask&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaskStorage&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> &gt;= int(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a7a05c55eb721c0bd568d4b7b1c2c7baf">HwLen</a>) ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> - <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a7a05c55eb721c0bd568d4b7b1c2c7baf">HwLen</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a7a05c55eb721c0bd568d4b7b1c2c7baf">HwLen</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InvertedPair = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SM = ShuffleMask(MaskStorage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comps = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#ae954fcbf0e9b2fe89cfa9d21b931b063">getPerfectCompletions</a>(SM, LogLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(Comps, 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagoniseldagtodaghvx-cpp-/opref/#a992ef4d19763351838821094e177cbe3">OpRef::fail</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pick = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hvxselector/#a499dd7cbe48e9f9eff2fe6ebbd1f87d7">completeToPerfect</a>(Comps, LogLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != LogLen; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Perm&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(Pick&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once we have Perm, represent it as cycles. Denote the maximum log2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (equal to log2(VecLen)-1) as M. The cycle containing M can then be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// written as (M a1 a2 a3 ... an). That cycle can be broken up into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple swaps as (M a1)(M a2)(M a3)...(M an), with the composition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order being from left to right. Any (contiguous) segment where the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values ai, ai+1...aj are either all increasing or all decreasing,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be implemented via a single vshuffvdd/vdealvdd respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is a cycle (a1 a2 ... an) that does not involve M, it can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be written as (M an)(a1 a2 ... an)(M a1). The first two cycles can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then be folded to get (M a1 a2 ... an)(M a1), and the above procedure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be used to generate a sequence of vshuffvdd/vdealvdd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume M = 4 and consider a permutation (0 1)(2 3). It can be written</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as (4 0 1)(4 0) composed with (4 2 3)(4 2), or simply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (4 0 1)(4 0)(4 2 3)(4 2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It can then be expanded into swaps as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (4 0)(4 1)(4 0)(4 2)(4 3)(4 2),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and broken up into &quot;increasing&quot; segments as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;(4 0)(4 1)&#93; &#91;(4 0)(4 2)(4 3)&#93; &#91;(4 2)&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is equivalent to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (4 0 1)(4 0 2 3)(4 2),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which can be implemented as 3 vshufvdd instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">CycleType = SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 8&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::set&lt;CycleType&gt; Cycles;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::set&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">All</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Perm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">All</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the cycle contains LogLen-1, move it to the front of the cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, return the cycle unchanged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canonicalize = &#91;LogLen&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CycleType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) -&gt; CycleType &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LogPos, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LogPos = 0; LogPos != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++LogPos)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#91;LogPos&#93; == LogLen - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LogPos == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CycleType NewC(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.begin() + LogPos, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewC.append(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.begin() + LogPos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> pfs = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::set&lt;CycleType&gt; &amp;Cs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#a16d7c5f77008a84ae20bf4a5c41e51f0ae88b4464fe326a51e6e6dfae28dd536d">Len</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ordering: shuff: 5 0 1 2 3 4, deal: 5 4 3 2 1 0 (for Log=6),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for bytes zero is included, for halfwords is not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cs.size() != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CycleType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = &#42;Cs.begin();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is done by using an &quot;undef&quot; vector as the second input.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Treat Shuff0 and Shuff1 as operands to another vector shuffle, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Idx as a (non-undef) element of the top level shuffle&#39;s mask, that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is, index into concat(Shuff0, Shuff1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assuming that Shuff0 and Shuff1 both operate on subvectors of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same source vector (as described by OpMap), return the index of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that source vector corresponding to Idx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleVectorSDNode &#42;OpShuff = Idx &lt; HwLen ? Shuff0 : Shuff1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Idx &gt;= HwLen)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Idx -= HwLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2754"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the mask index that M points at in the corresponding operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaybeN = OpShuff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorsdnode/#a449efebfbf16040c8d5c658f4c891f3f">getMaskElt</a>(Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaybeN &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2758"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MaybeN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcBase = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt; HwLen ? OpMap.at(OpShuff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 : OpMap.at(OpShuff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &gt;= HwLen)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> -= HwLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
